title: Porn For Women
alt: Yes, there are a lot of longing looks across the bridge of Galactica first, but that's beside the point!
transcript:
[Megan sits at a desk, typing on a computer with a fairly large flat-panel display.]
Megan: To the authors of Porn for Women:
Your book features pictures of hot, clothed guys cooking, doing laundry and vacuuming.[Megan continues typing.]
Megan: The idea seems to be that my deepest fantasies, like the rest of my life, likely revolve around housework.[Megan continues typing.]
Megan: So I wanted to write in to clarify: in my porn,[Megan leans forward in her chair.]
Megan: People fuck.
